name: Homey
0:
”Alexa, turn on the TV”
”Alexa, set the lights to hundred percent”
”Alexa, set the house temperature to twenty-two degrees”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Homey is the world's most advanced smart home platform. Control & monitor all your smart home devices from a single app. Automate with Homey Flow, and save with Homey Energy.

Connect this skill to enable voice control for your lights, thermostats, speakers and more.

A Homey account is required to use this skill.
